title: WAMC News Podcast - Episode 326
dc:creator: WAMC Northeast Public Radio
description: Goldwater…McCain….the end of American democracy? New York Times Magazine reporter Robert Draper has been taking a close look at Arizona and the state of conservatism there, where former President Donald Trump’s big lie about the 2020 election continues to reverberate and the GOP nominee for governor who decries "fake news" is a former Albany, N.Y. news anchor.
